item.title: Adding new NPC tradeable so i can make more shops ... help?
item.dc:creator: @Reverse_Hate Reverse Hate
item.description:
@Reverse_Hate wrote:

For ALL NPCID’s change it to the number the NPC is like 596 is Fat Tony

In NPCHandler.java if you want to make the NPC yell out things add this if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (npcs[i].actionTimer <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].forceChat("Message Here"); } }
To make him open a shop go to Actionhandler.java and add in case NPCID: c.getShops().openShop(ShopNumber); break;
And For Your Shop Go into Shop.cfg and add shop = 78 Shop_Name 2 2 13362 2147000000 13358 2147000000 13360 2147000000 13355 2147000000 13354 2147000000 13352 2147000000 13350 2147000000 13348 2147000000 13346 2147000000 773 2147000000 14484 2147000000 14479 2147000000 Change The First To 2’s To 1 For a Buy Anything Store. And Change Items To What you want to add and the 2147000000 to your quantity. And shop number (78) To a unique number and the Shop_Name you put into your wanted shop name. For Spaces Do “_” THIS IS FOR PROJECT INSANITY.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding new NPC tradeable so i can make more shops ... help?
